name: Ping Pong (itch) (WillCatoProductions)
description: don't let the ping pong touch the ground if it touches the ground you'll lose a life if you lose all of your life's its game over but there's a heart pick up if you go to the heart you'll get a extra life keep hitting the ping pong ball to score points if its game over when you lose all of your life's save your high score so you won't forget
